original_title: Touching the Sound: The Improbable Journey of Nobuyuki Tsujii
overview: Miraculous story of Japanese pianist blind from birth, who has become a symbol of Hope for all those with disabilities, hurdles to overcome, and problems in life. Performing throughout the world as a musical ambassador for his country, Nobuyuki Tsujii, or 'Nobu' as he is called by millions on fans with 'Nobu Fever', his is a story about the power of music.
title: Touching the Sound: The Improbable Journey of Nobuyuki Tsujii
